title: Talking hands 2. Parts 1-9 (Captioned)
brief_description: Viewers are introduced to signed English by teaching signs for 300 words most commonly used. Includes practice with short sentences. The vocabulary of the original Talking Hands is extended by 400 signs in Talking Hands 2.
